dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome to the DSV Programming 2 oral examination system
dashboard.submissionsDescription: Code submitted by the course administrator
dashboard.noSubmissionsYet: No submissions yet. Your code will appear here once uploaded by an administrator.

booking.title: Book Seminar
booking.noSubmissionsDescription: You don't have any code submissions yet. Your code will be uploaded by an administrator.
booking.noBookableDescription: Your submissions are either awaiting review or you've already booked all available seminars.
booking.bookSlotDescription: Select an assignment and available time slot
booking.notReadyForBooking: No assignments ready for booking. Your submissions need to be reviewed first.
booking.noSlotsAvailable: No available time slots for this assignment.
booking.examLanguageNote: The oral examination will be conducted in your selected language.
booking.awaitingReviewDescription: These submissions need to be reviewed before you can book a seminar
booking.infoTimeWindows: Time Windows: When you book a time window (e.g., 10:00-11:00), you can start your seminar anytime within that period.
booking.infoLanguage: Language: Choose Swedish or English for your oral examination. The session will be conducted in your selected language.
booking.selectBoth: Please select an assignment and time slot

results.title: Results
results.description: View your submission reviews, seminar outcomes, and final grades
results.noResultsDescription: You don't have any submissions or results to display.
results.finalGradesDescription: Assignments that have been fully graded
results.inProgressDescription: Submissions awaiting review, seminar, or grading
